about_the_game:
If you encounter any problems or errors, please post in the Discussions forum here on Steam or email our support email vimstudios.vns@gmail.com so we can help you. If you report a problem or error in the Reviews, we will not see it immediately. Thank you!

Prince of Suburbia is a kinetic (linear) adult visual novel that will never leave you with blue balls. Simple sandbox navigation leads through a silly story full of hot women just waiting to seduce you, and be seduced by you.

*Relationships marked with an asterisk are fully customizable.

Medical research gone awry

Your stepmom* Catherine is a medical researcher who is drowning in bills. She needs to prove her new fertility medication is safe for human consumption, and fast. How will the side effects of this experimental drug affect her, and those around her?

Naughty neighbors

Your neighbor, Naomi, and her daughter, Heather, have devious plans for you and the women you live with. Will you fall victim to their seductions, or turn the tables on them?

A crowded home

Your stepsister* Sarah is struggling with her own issues and seems to push away everyone who cares about her. Will she ever open up to you and accept your… help?

A family affair

To add to the chaos, stepaunt* Sonia and stepcousin* Fiona also need a place to stay. Will they be polite houseguests welcomed with open arms, or will they make themselves a little too comfortable?

content_descriptors.notes:
Prince of Suburbia includes explicit sex, language, and drug use. All characters in the game are 18+ and all sexual acts in the game are consensual. Must be 18 years or older to play.

Prince of Suburbia (Part 1 + Part 2) includes: addictive cum, adult breastfeeding, anal sex, big ass, big breasts, blackmail, blindfolds, boob job, butt job, creampie, cuddling, cumflation, drug use, exhibitionism, face sitting, fingering, fondling, gentle femdom, gloryhole, grinding, groping, group sex (MFF, MFFF, MFFFF), hand job, harem, impregnation, incest, interracial sex, kissing, lactation, lesbians (FF), light bondage, massage, masturbation, milking, oral sex, pregnancy, sex toys, sleep sex, spanking, teasing, thigh job, vaginal sex, virgin sex, voyeurism, wet dream. Some relationships between characters are customizable by the player.

There are situations in the game with blindfolds, where characters are consenting to sexual acts but are unaware of who exactly their partners are. There are situations in the game where characters are consenting to sexual acts but are unaware of the risk of pregnancy. There are also situations where sexual acts are done to a character that is sleeping but has already consented to/wants to be sexual with the other character.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

movies.name: Prince of Suburbia - Part 1 Official Steam Trailer

name: Prince of Suburbia - Part 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Prince of Suburbia is a kinetic (linear) adult visual novel with only one thing on its mind. This simple sandbox game is packed with lewd scenes and sprinkled with a fun story that aims to never leave you wanting more. Play Part 1 for FREE!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Italian, Polish, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Russian
